notes.title: Update
notes.text:
- Reworked MercuryTrade's Update system. Now you can check for updates manually ("Check for updates" in Settings). Added a checkbox "Updates Available notification". See Settings. 
- When there is an update available for download you'll receive its Patch Notes first. You can dismiss the update if you want. 
- Added an option so that a notification will close itself after a response. 
- Added support for multiple monitor setups. 
- Fixed an issue with notification buttons not responding for inputs for some players. 
- Mostly back-end changes.
